Pre-Game Insights: The Utah Jazz are in a period of reconstruction and have lost their first game of the season against the Memphis Grizzlies (120-124).
Golden State Warriors had a strong pre-season with 6 wins and 0 losses and won their first game of the season against the Portland Trail Blazers (104-140).
Lauri Markkanen delivered an outstanding performance in the first game with 35 points.
Golden State Warriors have lost key players Klay Thompson and Chris Paul during the last trade period.
Stephen Curry, Draymond Green, and Deantony Melton are uncertain for the match.
Buddy Hield scored 22 points off the bench in the first game for the Warriors.
